entities.name: NVIDIA CORPORATION
entities.description: NVIDIA Corporation is a technology company that provides graphics processing units (GPUs) for gaming and professional markets, as well as system on a chip units (SoCs) for the mobile computing and automotive market. This document covers various financial aspects of NVIDIA including unaudited pro forma information, lease obligations, and stock-based compensation.

entities.name: MELLANOX
entities.description: Mellanox is a company that was acquired by NVIDIA Corporation. Fiscal year 2021 includes $80 million of operating lease assets addition due to Mellanox.

relationships.relationship_description: NVIDIA Corporation acquired Mellanox, resulting in $80 million of operating lease assets addition in fiscal year 2021.
